== Choornikkara (CT) (627980) ==

Choornikkara (CT) is a town in the [[Aluva]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 16.8 sq. km. and harbouring 10403 households with total population of 43207 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 8 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 235 km. Male population is 21151 and female population is 22056. Scheduled Caste population is 3278 and Scheduled Tribes population is 164. Census Location Code of the town is 627980<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 8 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 8 km. Railway station is at Aluva at a distance of 4 km.
